title: Bugsplat when i try to open LoL
body: When I doubleclick the LoL icon it just shows a bugsplat. what do i do?

replies.body: Bugsplats generally indicate a driver problem or bad game files that can't render the game.  For this specific issue, there could be bad files that can't get the client to load properly.  Go over the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix this up.  More specifically, you can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to repair any of those bad files!  Let me know if you have any questions!

Nothing, i tried a lot of things, the best i did is get into the client- the part where the "launch" button is. From there, the bugsplats happen again.

So i decided to completely reinstall lol now...
